alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wood County through 515 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Pittsville, or 19 miles northwest of Wisconsin Rapids, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pittsville around 450 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Milladore, Sandhill Wildlife Area, North Wood County Park, Sherry, Auburndale, Walker, Dexterville, Hewitt, Blenker and Arpin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
